BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: Sometimes your archmages want to settle down and clear the way for younger more powerful mages. The older mages can contribute to the training of new adepts and boost the research in the town where they settle.
This pile of treasure is used by dragon cultists to find and lure wyrmlings that can be then trained to serve. It also can attract the attention of the giant eagles in Erebus.
Temples of the Deep continue to contribute to the religions dedication to the vast oceans.

Only three island resorts may exist in the world. They produce good gold, but may only be built on islands that have 7 or less tiles. One fortified unit (5 turn fortify) may visit the resort each turn (and will gain the Blessed promotion).
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.
Treasures give significant financial and resource rewards to the city they are returned to, but will only last 12 turns. Take them to cities that boost gold output to utilize them better.

This building allows equipment to be purchased by units. The supply may be depleted, but replenishes with time based on population. Heavy equipment requires a population of at least 10. Master crafted equipment requires a population of at least 15.
